mapper.select: SELECT A.WorkOrder_ItemCode, C.Product_Item_Name WorkOrder_ItemName, A.WorkOrder_EquipCode, B.Equipment_Info_Name WorkOrder_EquipName, B.Equipment_Type FROM WorkOrder_tbl A inner join Equipment_Info_tbl B on A.WorkOrder_EquipCode = B.Equipment_Info_Code and B.Equipment_Type = '325' inner join Product_Info_tbl C on A.WorkOrder_ItemCode = C.Product_Item_Code where A.WorkOrder_ItemCode = #{itemCode}
